page.title: 10CHANNINGS OF YEOVIL
page.content: { CHANNINGS}is a family business and has been since 1939.The shop sells bicycles,nursery goods and toys,and a quarter of the goods are British made. Recently trade has declined and Mr.Channing has let half of his double shop to an 'Interiors' firm.The shop is in a good position in one of the main streets,with nearby parking facilities but Mr.Channing fears the influence of the new Quedam shopping centre on his business.He sees little future for shops like his as Supermarkets are able to buy in large quantities and sell at cheap prices. Business is always good at CHristmas but the rest of the time it is getting worse each year.
